text: Cambuslang railway station is a train station for the Scottish town of Cambuslang, in South Lanarkshire (near Glasgow.) The station is owned and managed by First ScotRail. There is a train every ten minutes. Trains come more often at busy times of the day. The station has a ticket office at the top, with a bridge across the track and two ramps down to each platform. == Other websites == *Train times and station information for Cambuslang from the National Rail website. *Map and Aerial photo from Multimap.com *First ScotRail: Official Website *SPT Official Website Category:Railway stations in Scotland Category:South Lanarkshire
title: Cambuslang railway station
